item.title: GEN CONT OFF Lights – Generator Inoperative

remarks.para: One may be inoperative for an associated inoperative generator.

note.para: Substitute the L(R) GEN OFF advisory message for the inoperative GEN CONT OFF light in the GENERATOR OFF non-normal procedure.
Land and Hold Short Operations (LAHSO) prohibited.

numlitem.para: Reduce Takeoff Climb Limit Weight by 500 lbs.
Reduce Landing Climb Limit Weight by 700 lbs.
Reduce Method 1 or 2 Terrain Clearance Weight by 1,500 lbs.
Add 370 lbs/hour MEL fuel usage for APU operation.
Land and Hold Short Operations (LAHSO) prohibited.

placard.para: Placard Generator CONT OFF Light "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
